Text: Midyear Exception AwardsDan Please review the attached request for Mid year exception awards Thanks Dave

RE Midyear Exception Awardsfor the feedback We will manage expectations with respect to the Trailblazers deals and will highlight these deals in the yearend process If we believe that there is anyone who we are at risk of keeping I will let you know Dave

Schedule for June st business review in Omahaare planning on the following schedule for the upcoming business review in Omaha The goal of the meeting is to encourage discussion about the focus and direction of each of Northerns Marketing teams rather than simply presenting material With this in mind we are planning to have smaller meetings and divide the discussion in to four sessions In additon to Stan Dan Rod if available and myself we will have only those people listed below at each session Topic Power Business Development and Acquisitions plus long term South End Strategy Participants John Dushinske Mike Stage Chuck Wilkinson Mike McGowan Shelly Corman Topic LDC Accounts and relationships Participants Bill Fowler Frank Semin Bob Stevens Topic Overall Commercial Regulatory Strategy SLA Rate Case Participants Mary Kay Miller Steve Kirk Kent MIller Drew Fossum Shelly Corman Topic Storage Pricing Structuring Risk Management Participants Kent Miller Jo Williams Sue Neville Lee Ferrell We will follow up with a more detailed outline prior to the meeting Please let me know if you are unable to attend Thanks Dave
